name: Scoop Lay
description: Defend the ball with your body

name: 1-Dribble Lay
description: Use your bodyweight to get into position

name: Backboard Floater
description: Develop the soft touch needed for a floater.

name: High Arc Floater
description: Improve your ability to score in the paint.

name: Elbow Jump Shot
description: Spin and catch the ball before shooting a floater

name: Elbow Fadeaway
description: Fadeaway while shooting from the elbow

name: Elbow Drive Pull-up
description: Drive from the elbow and pull up for a closer shot.

name: Midrange Off the Dribble
description: Hit midrange shots off the dribble at game speed

name: Catch and Shoot Midrange
description: Spin the ball up before catching and ripping

name: Midrange Pull-up
description: Pull-up from your best midrange spot

name: Corner-3
description: Hit a 3-pointer from the closest corner

name: Spin and catch 3-pointer
description: Spin the ball up, catch it, dip and shoot

name: Quick Release Jumper
description: Touch the ball down, then go as fast as you can
